author: Philip Delves Broughton
title: Review: Spreadsheets as a Work of Art
text:
In 1993, Tom Hodgkinson founded the Idler magazine in London. It didnâ€™t argue for pure sloth. More for less frantic wheel-spinning. He felt that the cult of compression, busyness and industry merited a counter-cult, one of ease, slowness and thought. Rather than pounding away at the gym, try a long walk. Instead of gulping down a sandwich at your desk, take some time over lunch to chew and ponder.
